ing: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
des: "This garlic and basil spread gives ordinary sandwiches a kick."
ins: Combine basil leaves, garlic, and red pepper flakes in a food processor or blender. Pulse 3 to 4 times. Slowly pour in canola oil and olive oil and blend until thick and creamy, about 30 seconds. Add additional oil if needed to make the spread smoother.
